boards.ai_modal_description: Suggest additional relevant boards and tasks based on the project context.
boards.ai_prompt_instruction: Generate up to 5 new boards (task groups) and maximum 50 tasks, relevant and non-redundant, to enrich this project. Only suggest new tasks and boards, different from those already listed. Respond in structured JSON: { "boards": [ { "name": "...", "tasks": ["...", ...] }, ... ] }
boards.press_enter_info: Press enter to add a task
boards.no_archive_available: No archives available at the moment

createProject.title: Create a project with AI
createProject.description: Describe your project, AI will suggest relevant tasks and task groups (boards).

communication.title: Create a communication plan
communication.prompt:
I want to create a complete communication plan for my company. I need to organize my communication actions across multiple channels (social media, email marketing, press relations, events).

Propose a complete and detailed project structure that covers ALL aspects of a professional communication plan. Don't hesitate to include elements I might not have thought of: strategy, creation, production, distribution, measurement, optimization, team management, budget, tools, training, monitoring, etc.

Be creative and think about all the best practices and essential steps for a successful communication plan.

mobile.title: Create a mobile application
mobile.prompt:
I want to develop a native mobile application for iOS and Android. The project requires a structured approach from conception to deployment.

Create a COMPLETE project structure that covers absolutely ALL aspects of professional mobile app development. Think of everything: user research, technical architecture, design system, development, testing, security, performance, deployment, marketing, analytics, maintenance, evolution, team management, documentation, training, user support, etc.

Be exhaustive and propose detailed tasks that even an experienced developer might forget. Include best practices, modern tools, and all business and technical aspects.

woocommerce.title: Create a WordPress WooCommerce site
woocommerce.prompt:
I want to create a complete e-commerce site with WordPress and WooCommerce. The project must cover all technical and business aspects of a professional online store.

Propose an EXHAUSTIVE project structure that covers ABSOLUTELY ALL aspects of a professional e-commerce. Think of everything: business strategy, UX/UI, development, security, payments, logistics, SEO, marketing, analytics, legal, GDPR, performance, maintenance, customer support, training, evolution, etc.

Be very detailed and include tasks that are often overlooked: user testing, conversion optimization, returns management, automated emails, cross-selling, loyalty, etc. Think like an e-commerce expert who leaves nothing to chance.

wordpress.title: Create a WordPress showcase site
wordpress.prompt:
I want to create a professional showcase website with WordPress to present my company and its services. The site must be modern, optimized and easy to maintain.

The project must include:
- Needs analysis and site structure definition
- WordPress theme selection and customization
- Content creation (texts, images, videos)
- On-page and technical SEO optimization
- Social media integration
- Contact form setup
- Analytics tools configuration
- Performance optimization (speed, mobile)
- Site security (SSL, backups, updates)
- Cross-browser and responsive testing
- WordPress administration training
- Natural search engine optimization strategy
- Website launch and hosting configuration

Can you create a project structure with boards organized by phases and specific tasks for each creation step?

marketing.title: Marketing plan
marketing.prompt:
I want to develop a complete marketing plan to grow my business. I need a structured strategy covering all aspects of digital and traditional marketing.

The plan must include:
- Market analysis and competitor study
- Persona definition and target segments
- Positioning strategy and value proposition
- Digital marketing (SEO, SEA, social media, email)
- Traditional marketing actions (print, radio, events)
- Content strategy and storytelling
- Communication plan and public relations
- Marketing budget management and ROI
- Strategic partnerships and collaborations
- Influencer marketing and ambassadors
- Performance analysis and KPIs
- Continuous campaign optimization
- 12-month action planning

Can you propose an organization in thematic boards with detailed tasks to effectively structure this marketing plan?

landing.title: Create a landing page
landing.prompt:
I want to create a high-conversion landing page to promote a specific product or service. The page must be optimized to convert visitors into prospects or customers.

The project must cover:
- Target audience analysis and their needs
- Conversion objective definition (sale, lead, registration)
- Conversion-oriented UX/UI design
- Persuasive content writing (headlines, CTAs, testimonials)
- Reassurance elements integration (guarantees, certifications)
- Tracking and analytics setup
- SEO and SEA optimization for paid traffic
- A/B testing on key elements
- CRM and email marketing tools integration
- Mobile optimization and loading speed
- Optimized form setup
- Performance and conversion rate analysis
- Continuous optimization based on data

Can you create a project structure with boards organized by phases (design, development, optimization) and specific tasks to maximize conversions?

brand.title: Create a brand identity
brand.prompt:
I want to create a complete and consistent brand identity for my company. The project must cover all visual and conceptual aspects of the brand.

The project must include:
- Brand strategy and positioning definition
- Logo creation and variations
- Brand guidelines definition (colors, typography, styles)
- Communication materials creation (business cards, stationery)
- Digital brand identity development (social media, website)
- Brand tone and personality definition
- Style guide and brand book creation
- Applications on different media (packaging, signage)
- Brand legal protection (trademark registration, copyright)
- Identity deployment strategy
- Target testing and validation
- Team training on identity usage
- Brand image monitoring and evolution

Can you propose a project structure with boards organized by creative phases and detailed tasks to develop a strong and memorable brand identity?

product.title: Product launch retro-planning
product.prompt:
I want to create a detailed retro-planning for launching a new product. The project must organize all steps from conception to commercial launch.

The project must cover:
- Product development phase and testing
- Market research and competitive analysis
- Pricing strategy and positioning definition
- Marketing and communication materials creation
- Distribution channels preparation
- Sales team training
- Tracking and analytics tools setup
- Advertising campaign planning
- Launch event organization
- Press relations and influencer management
- Customer service and support preparation
- User testing and final adjustments
- Post-launch monitoring and optimization
- Updates and evolution planning

Can you create a project structure with chronological boards and tasks with deadlines to effectively orchestrate this product launch?

social.title: Social media publishing schedule
social.prompt:
I want to organize a publishing schedule for my company's social media. The project must structure content creation and distribution across multiple platforms.

The project must include:
- Existing social media audit and analysis
- Content strategy definition by platform
- Monthly editorial calendar creation
- Content type planning (posts, stories, videos, lives)
- Visual and graphic creation management
- Text and caption writing
- Publication programming and scheduling
- Community engagement and management
- Performance monitoring and analytics
- Social advertising campaign management
- Competitive monitoring and trends
- Seasonal and event content creation
- Collaboration and partnership management
- Continuous optimization based on results

Can you propose an organization in thematic boards with recurring tasks to maintain an active and engaging social presence?
